summary: The package implements a serverless pipeline that extracts Google Analytics 4 event data from BigQuery, cleans and normalizes it, and trains an Alternating Least Squares collaborativeâ€‘filtering model. It serialises the trained model, stores artifacts, and updates an OpenSearch index, all orchestrated by an AWS Lambda entry point with tracing support.
business_intent: Automatically generate personalized recommendations for users by leveraging their GA4 interaction history, enabling continuous model refresh without managing infrastructure and improving engagement and conversion rates.
